properties.areaDesc: Sevier Smoky Mountains; Blount Smoky Mountains; Cocke Smoky Mountains
properties.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 19 at 3:05PM EST until February 20 at 10:00PM EST by NWS Morristown TN
properties.description:
* WHAT...Periods of moderate to heavy snow expected. Total snow
accumulations of 2 to 4 inches with up to 6 inches across the
highest elevations.

* WHERE...Cocke Smoky Mountains, Blount Smoky Mountains and
Sevier Smoky Mountains Counties.

* WHEN...From 4 AM to 10 PM EST Thursday.

* IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous
conditions could impact the morning or evening commute.
properties.instruction:
If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in
your vehicle in case of an emergency.

The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can
be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

NWSheadline: WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 4 AM TO 10 PM EST THURSDAY
